description: Perfect for breakfast. Fill it with butter, jam, or a slice of cheese.
name: Pandesal Traditional Filipino Bread Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix milk, melted butter, egg and yeast into a large bowl. You do not have to bloom this since we are using instant yeast.

Add in flour, sugar and salt. Mix until well combined. Once the dough has come together, transfer it into a floured counter. Knead the dough for 10 minutes until smooth and shiny. Put it into an oiled bowl, cover with cling wrap and let it rest in a warm place for 1 hour.

Punch out the gas and divide the dough into 18 equal pieces. Roll out each piece into a ball and cover with Semolina flour. Place them right next to each other on a greased baking sheet. Cover them with cling wrap and rest for another 30 minutes until double in size.
Preheat oven to 180 degrees C. Bake for 18-20 minutes until golden brown. Serve while still hot.
